description: The collapse at an inn on Pawleys Island, South Carolina, sent people plummeting 10 feet. Thirteen were hurt badly enough to require treatment.
title: Thirteen Hurt When Deck Collapses
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
More than a dozen people were hurt in South Carolina Friday when the deck they were standing on gave way and collapsed, authorities said.
The deck collapse happened at the Sea View Inn on Pawleys Island, South Carolina, a barrier island off the Atlantic Ocean about 70 miles northeast of Charleston, at about 6:30 p.m. Friday. None of the injuries were life-threatening, NBC affiliate WMBF reported.
